amendment.description: An amendment numbered 34 printed in Part B of House Report 116-32 to specifiy that trauma and behavioral health specialists are included in the term health care professionals. Also, the amendment would increase the number of health care professionals that specialize in child exposure to violence.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schrier amendment (A034) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Schrier amendment (A034) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A034) offered by Ms. Schrier.
